short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Consolidate and share multiple tabs with a single link

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SendTabs is like airdrop for your browser tabs. 

It is the easiest way to share your browser tabs in one clean link. Instead of messaging multiple URLs one by one, simply select your open tabs, add a label, and share a single organized link with anyone. 

Recipients can preview tab contents and open everything with one click, making collaboration and information sharing seamless. Access your complete history of shared tab groups in your personal profile, ensuring you never lose track of important collections. 

Perfect for sharing research, project resources, shopping lists, or travel planning with colleagues, friends, and family. Install SendTabs to transform how you share browser tabs - because sometimes one link is better than many.

Key Features:
- Group and share multiple tabs with one link
- Preview tab contents before opening
- Open all tabs with a single click
- Access your complete tab sharing history
- Free to use with Google sign-in
